articles.description: Kim Kardashian has been accused of editing her flawless social media snaps after photos from the Vanity Fair Oscars after-party showed her real skin texture.
articles.content:
Kim Kardashian has been accused of editing her flawless social media snaps after photos from the Vanity Fair Oscars after-party showed her real skin texture.
